subject: Trade Shows and Fairs
Skateboards
Surfing
lead_paragraph: Scores of bikini-clad models, tattooed and scarred skateboarders and tanned surf bums promoted their sponsors’ brands at an action sports trade show at the San Diego Convention Center.
snippet: Scores of bikini-clad models, tattooed and scarred skateboarders and tanned surf bums promoted their sponsors’ brands at an action sports trade show at the San Diego Convention Center.
